channel.title: Leetcode on 算法学习笔记
channel.description: Recent content in Leetcode on 算法学习笔记

item.title: 1. 两数之和
item.description: 两数之和 题目 English Given an array of integers, return indices of the two numbers such that they add up to a specific target. You may assume that each input would have exactly one solution, and you may not use the same element twice. Example: Given nums = [2, 7, 11, 15], target = 9, Because nums[0] + nums[1] = 2 + 7 = 9, return [0, 1]. 中文 给定一个整数数组 nums 和一个目标值 target，请你在该数组中找出和为目标值的那 两个 整数，并返回他们的数组下标。

item.title: 2. 两数相加
item.description: 两数相加 题目 English 中文 分析 基础 进阶 高阶 题解 C C++ C# Go Java JavaScript Kotlin PHP Python2 Python3 class Solution(object): def addTwoNumbers(self, l1, l2): """:type l1: ListNode:type l2: ListNode:rtype: ListNode""" carry = 0 root = node = ListNode(0) while l1 or l2 or carry: v1 = v2 = 0 if l1: v1 = l1.
